message: Let's make a deal. I take $60, you take $40. It's a good deal for you in the first round!
I think 60-40 is more fair, considering the inflation!
Bob, let's be realistic. This is my last good offer.  I take $55, you get $45, and we avoid further losses from inflation.
Inflation is taking its toll on your gains, Alice. I think 70-30 is a more reasonable split now.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  I'm taking a big hit from inflation.  You're getting $55, my final offer.
